description: The IMU shall provide pitch rate data at a minimum rate of 100 Hz.
The IMU pitch rate data latency shall not exceed 10 milliseconds.
The attitude sensor shall provide pitch angle measurements with accuracy better than 0.5 degrees.
The sensor interface module shall timestamp pitch sensor data upon acquisition.
The sensor interface module shall discard pitch sensor data older than 20 milliseconds.
The sensor interface module shall flag invalid pitch sensor data.
The pitch control law shall execute at a minimum rate of 100 Hz.
The pitch control computation shall complete within 5 milliseconds per cycle.
The pitch control law shall use validated pitch rate and pitch angle inputs.
The control law shall generate elevator command outputs each execution cycle.
The control software shall prioritize pitch control tasks over non-critical tasks.
The elevator actuator shall respond to command inputs within 30 milliseconds.
The actuator control module shall confirm command acceptance within 10 milliseconds.
The actuator control module shall limit elevator deflection to certified bounds.
The system shall compare redundant pitch sensor outputs to detect discrepancies.
The system shall declare a sensor fault if discrepancy exceeds defined thresholds.
Upon detection of a sensor fault the system shall exclude the faulty sensor from control computation.
The system shall continue pitch control using remaining valid sensors after a fault.
The system shall detect sustained deviations between commanded and actual pitch response.
The system shall display a pitch control warning to the pilot within 1 second of anomaly detection.
